Global

Methods

onSend(data, payload, frame)

This function is called when the 'send' evnet is emitted The default implementation will emit the 'send_pair' event with the frame argument. If you want to manipulate This data before the event is triggered you can do so here.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

the data to be send
payload Array.<Number>

the payload that will be transmitted
frame Object

the data object parsed from payload

Type Definitions

cmdObj

An object parsed from a command id to access the cmd, type and subtype of the command

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
cmdObj.id Object

The full id of the command e.g. 'beamer~$onoff$~4k_versions
cmdObj.cmd Object

The command key e.g. 'onoff'
cmdObj.type Object <optional>

The type of the command e.g. 'beamer'
cmdObj.subtype Object <optional>

The subtype of the command e.g. '4k_versions'
